* To get the invite to the Emperor's cup you MUST win the Winner's Cup tournament in December. Mr. Matdoc will talk about Dynast and the Emperor cup regardless of whether or not you win the Winner's Cup, but you will not get an actual invitaion, and it will not appear on the Battles schedule unless you have that win.

Greatest 3 Battle Note: You will recieve invitations to the Greatest 3 battles one month prior to the first time you reach S rank. After that first invite, you need check the Battles schedule yourself if you wish to attend again.

Thanks to: Velo, John Hawley, Seija
